mapper.select: select mid, product, price, description, cafe_id from menu
select menu.mid, menu.cafe_id, menu.product, menu.price, menu.description, menu.tag, menu.mid like_count from menu where cafe_id = #{cafe_id}
select cafe_id, product, price, description from menu where mid = #{mid}
select mid, price, description, cafe_id from menu where product like '%'+#{product}+'%'
mapper.insert: insert into ( product, price, description, cafe_id ) values ( #{product}, #{price}, #{cafe_id}, #{tag})
mapper.update: update menu set product = #{product}, price = #{price}, description =#{description}, cafe_id = #{cafe_id}, like_count =#{like_count}, tag =#{tag}, where mid=#{mid}
